original_text: She has killed an animal for a big meal. She has mixed her wine. She has also prepared her table.
korean_text: 짐승을 잡으며 포도주를 혼합하여 상을 갖추고

sentences.original_text: She has killed an animal for a big meal.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 큰 식사를 위해 짐승을 잡았다.

sentences.original_text: She has also prepared her table.
